locale.name: tr_TR
locale.message: Integrate OJS with Piwik, a free and open source web site traffic analysis application. Requires that Piwik is already installed. Please see the Piwik site for more information.

With this plugin enabled Piwik may be used to collect and analyze web site usage and traffic for this journal. Please note that this plugin requires that Piwik is already installed. Please see the Piwik site for more information.
Pwik kurulumunuz için tam rul (Örneğin: http://myserver.net/piwik).
Lütfen http:// dahil geçerli bir url giriniz.
Within Piwik, click on Settings -> Websites. The site profile ID is displayed next to your site profile name.
Lütfen bir site profil N.S.'sı giriniz.
